dialogues.text: Then I'm a reflection of you. She smiles.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: Now that line actually does work.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: I'm sorry about last night. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: It’s okay.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: I wish I could explain... She sees him struggling, takes his hands in hers.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: You're here now. That’s all that matters. They smile at each other.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Come on. I’ve got someone that I want you to meet...

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: at the bar as the band suddenly changes to a SALSA number

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: (smiling) Oh yeah. And Matt said those dance lessons would never pay off. He glances over to a circle of South African Diplomates a winks at a seven-foot-tall BLACK GODDESS.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hell-o...

dialogues.speaker: NIKOLAS NATCHIOS
dialogues.text: A distinguished Greek businessman. He's greeting a series VIP’S from around the world, all here to kiss his ring. H lights up at the sight of his daughter.

dialogues.speaker: NATCHIOS
dialogues.text: Elektra...

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: How are you doing, Dad?

dialogues.speaker: NATCHIOS
dialogues.text: (under his breath) I think my smile is stuck this way. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Elektra laughs.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: I’d like you to meet my friend, Matt Murdock. Natchios' smile fades as Matt holds out his hand.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: It's a pleasure, sir.

dialogues.speaker: NATCHIOS
dialogues.text: (shaking his hand) It's rare when my daughter introduces me to one of her “friends.”

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: Dad...

dialogues.speaker: NATCHIOS
dialogues.text: What do you do for a living?

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: Dag.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: It‘s okay, Elektra. I don‘t mind. (to Natchios) I'm a professional gold digger, sir. Natchios freezes.

dialogues.speaker: MATT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It's my intention to make your daughter fall in love with me, ingratiate myself to you, and eventually walk away with millions of your family’s money. Stunned silence.

dialogues.speaker: MATT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And may I add that you look fantastic this evening, sir. Natchios bursts out LAUGHING. Elektra watches in amazemen as her father takes Matt and claps him on the back.

dialogues.speaker: NATCHIOS
dialogues.text: Very good! Very good indeed! Can I have someone bring you something to eat, Matt?

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: I’m fine, thanks. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: One of Natchios’ aides is flagging his attention.

dialogues.speaker: NATCHIOS
dialogues.text: Duty calls. I hope you have a wonderful time with my daughter. (walking off, laughing) ‘Professional gold digger...’ Elektra is floored.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: Oh my God, he offered you food. I’ve never~--he’s never done that before...

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Let’s dance.

dialogues.speaker: THE DANCE FLOOR
dialogues.text: As Foggy slow dances with the beautiful amazon. It’s obvi she doesn’t understand a word that he’s saying:

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Did you hear about that new sushi place that caters just to lawyers? (beat) It's called SOSUMI! He cracks himself up. The woman just stares.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sosumi! So-sue-me, it’s a...so you're from Uganda?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Matt and Elektra dance. But as they do Matt hears the BASS HEARTBEAT of Wilson Fisk in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: How does your father know Wilson Fisk?

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: They used to be business partners a long time ago. Why?

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: No reason. Just curious.  62.

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: They sip champagne as they glance over to see Matt and Elektra dancing together.

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: She looks so happy...

dialogues.speaker: NATCHIOS
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: I haven't seen her smile like that since before the tragedy. Natchios stops as Fisk whispers: FISK (CONT’D) Poor girl. Right in front of her eyes...

dialogues.speaker: NATCHIOS
dialogues.text: Why must you bring that up?

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: History has a way of repeating itself. And then Fisk takes the red rose from his jacket and slip into Natchios’ lapel. Natchios goes pale.

dialogues.speaker: NATCHIOS
dialogues.text: W-What are you saying?

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: Just saying good-bye, old friend. Fisk pats the rose.

dialogues.speaker: FISK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Just saying good-bye. Fisk walks off as we CLOSE ON Natchios’ horrified reactio CuT TO:

dialogues.speaker: THE BAR
dialogues.text: Where we see Foggy trying to close the deal.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Where are you staying?

dialogues.speaker: AMAZON
dialogues.text: “Staying?” (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Hotel? She nods, understanding.

dialogues.speaker: AMAZON
dialogues.text: Mark.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Uh oh. Who’s Mark?

dialogues.speaker: AMAZON
dialogues.text: Mark. Hotel.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Oh, you’re staying at The Mark. She nods. And then Foggy freezes as he realizes:

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: There is no Mark Welch... (beat) There's a Welch at The Mark...

dialogues.speaker: ELERTRA
dialogues.text: Lost in each other’s arms when:

dialogues.speaker: NATCHIOS, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Elektra! She looks to see her father waving her over, flanked by t of his bodyguards.

dialogues.speaker: NATCHIOS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Pa-me!

dialogues.speaker: . ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: Ti hora eine?

dialogues.speaker: NATCHIOS
dialogues.text: (flustered)

dialogues.speaker: NOW
dialogues.text: Elektra turns to Matt.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: I have to go.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: What is it? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: ELERTRA
dialogues.text: Something's wrong. Something bad. She kisses him.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Elektra...

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: I’m sorry, Matt... She hurries off to join her father. We STAY ON Matt’s reaction as we...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MUSIC UP: WHEN WORLDS COLLIDE by Powerman 5000 We watch as TWO MOTORCYCLE COPS park their bikes and stro into the neighborhood diner just as...

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: steps out with a cigarette dangling from his lips. He’s wearing an “I LOVE NEW YORK” T-shirt beneath his lon blue leather coat. He whips out a FORK from the diner and jabs it into one of the police motorcycle’s gas tanks. CuT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where the two Motorcycle Cops sit at the counter, talking the bottle-blonde WAITRESS.

dialogues.speaker: MOTORCYCLE COP
dialogues.text: Hiya, Margie. What’s good today?

dialogues.speaker: WAITRESS
dialogues.text: The diner down the street. They LAUGH good-naturedly. And then we hear the sound of Motorcycle engine ROARING to life. WAITRESS (cont'd) Hey, ain't that--? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: MOTORCYCLE COP
dialogues.text: Hey! HEY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Motorcycle Cops run out in time to see Bullseye ROARI OFF on one of their police bikes!

dialogues.speaker: MOTORCYCLE COP
dialogues.text: Crazy sonofabitch!

dialogues.speaker: MOTORCYCLE COP
dialogues.text: He won’t get far... Cop #2 starts up the other bike and ROARS after hin, unknowingly leaving a TRAIL OF GASOLINE in his wake...

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: as he speeds down the Avenue. The Motorcycle cop pulls up alongside him with his LIGHTS FLASHING.

dialogues.speaker: PULL OVER
dialogues.text: Bullseye points innocently to himself.

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: Me?

dialogues.speaker: I SAID PULL OVER
dialogues.text: Bullseye flicks his CIGARETTE at the enraged Motorcycle C

dialogues.speaker: MOTORCYCLE COP
dialogues.text: You missed, asshole!

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: The name’s Bullseye. (beat) And I never miss. The cigarette IGNITES the trail of gasoline!

dialogues.speaker: THE MOTORCYCLE COP
dialogues.text: looks in his rearview mirror to see a TRAIL OF FIRE racin behind him! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: He panics and GUNS THE ENGINE, forcing even more gasoline of the tank! The Cop SCREAMS as the flames race up onto t back of the bike causing the gas tank to EXPLODE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THREE STONE GARGOYLES are perched atop an old bank buildi But as we CLOSE IN we see the one in the middle is... DAREDEVIL. Sifting through the sounds of the street. The heavy engin of a STRETCH LIMOUSINE passes by as we hear:

dialogues.speaker: ELERKTRA, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: I don't understand--

dialogues.speaker: NATCHIOS, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: New York is not safe. Not tonight. That’s all you need to know. Daredevil stands.

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: I‘m watching over you, baby... He follows the limousine from above as we

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Bullseye sees a BLACK STRETCH LIMOUSINE. He grins and guns his bike to head them off. CuT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Daredevil leaps from building to building. The ROAR of the rogue motorcycle is headed straight for the limousine

dialogues.speaker: ON DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: as he SWAN DIVES off of the roof! But at the last minute tucks his legs and hits the roof of the limousine! KA-THU Elektra and Niko look up through the sunroof to see-~

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: standing on top of the roof! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: CcuT TO: Bullseye with a child-like smile spreading across his fac

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: This is my kind of town... He pulls a STRAP from his coat and locks the throttle in place. And then--he stands--SURFING the motorcycle down t street and freeing his hands to do what Bullseye does bes

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Bullseye presses the middle button on what appears to STAR-SHAPED BELT BUCKLE. But the “buckle” is actually a stack of deadly SHURIKEN. Six Chinese throwing stars snap off and slide between each one of his gloved fingers.

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Here comes the pain! He CROSS-THROWS both hands of his shuriken at once!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the SOUND OF THE SHURIKEN cutting through the air are pinpointed by the sonograph of his radar sense.

dialogues.speaker: ON DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: drawing his billy club from his holster and FANNING it ac his body as--CHUK! CHUK! CHUK! CHUK! CHUK! CHUK!--he catc each shuriken in the shaft of his club!

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: (stunned) You made me miss...I never miss...

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: Neither do I. Daredevil THROWS his billy club down INTO THE SPOKES of t motorcycle! It LOCKS UP against the fork, sending the bik CRASHING and SLIDING down the street!

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: leaps from the skidding motorcycle and onto the limousine They begin trading punches and kicks as the car drives on BooM! BOOM! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The sound of gunfire erupts at their feet as we...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Stavros fires up through the roof at both men!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daredevil KICKS Bullseye back to the rear of the car. But Bullseye reaches back and rips the CAR ANTENNA off. . He WHIPS it across Daredevil’s face! Daredevil stumbles b and falls off the back of the moving limo!

dialogues.speaker: ON BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: as he turns back to the business at hand. He SMASHES thro the glass of the sunroof with a Muy Thai elbow strike... CuT TO:

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: hanging onto the rear fender by his cane! His thighs and stomach SCRAPE along the speeding asphalt, SHREDDING his costume to his bleeding torso. He fights back the pain as PULLS himself back up onto the limousine...

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: reaches for Natchios just as DAREDEVIL'S HANDS reach into frame and THROW him off of the limo and onto the pavement We watch as he tumbles along the street behind them when:

dialogues.speaker: NIKO
dialogues.text: (looking up)

dialogues.speaker: WATCH OUT
dialogues.text: The Limo Driver turns to see a TRAFFIC JAM up ahead! He SLAMS on the brakes as Daredevil is THROWN OVER THE HOOD!

dialogues.speaker: ON DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: as he SOMERSAULTS through the air before sticking a perfe landing onto the hood of a cab! Even as...

dialogues.speaker: THE LIMOUSINE
dialogues.text: slides out sideways and SLAMS into a bus! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: We hear SIRENS WAIL as Elektra tumbles out the back with father. Stavros is out cold, his head through the rear windshield.

dialogues.speaker: ON BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: as he picks the jagged-ended billy club from the motorcyc wreckage. He smiles and turns back as we see...

dialogues.speaker: NATCHIOS
dialogues.text: comforting his daughter. He turns just as-~THWAAACK!--the billy club pierces Natchios’ chest! Elektra SCREAMS!

dialogues.speaker: ON BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: grinning at his infallible aim from a city block away.

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: Bull‘s-eye. He disappears into the shadows of the alleyway.

dialogues.speaker: ON ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: as she cradles her father in her arms. A dark pool of BLO spreads out across the asphalt. She tries to stop the flo of blood with her hands as Natchios spasms, clutching at daughter as he dies.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: No...no... Elektra looks up to see Daredevil standing atop the taxi ELERTRA (CONT’D) Murderer.

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: No... Elektra lunges for Stavros’ gun and OPENS FIRE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daredevil is forced to flee as the police arrive. Elektra keeps pulling the trigger until the clip CLICKS empty. An then she drops to her knees and SOBS as we CuT To:  70.

dialogues.speaker: CU BILLY CLUB
dialogues.text: broken and bloody, being bagged by a Forensics Unit as Detective Manolis looks on. Manolis scowls when he sees..

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: pull up, still wearing his rental tuxedo from the party. Urich watches the scene unfold in disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: No...

dialogues.speaker: DET. MANOLIS
dialogues.text: You made him out to be a hero. Buta vigilante is just a killer with style. Manolis flicks his cigarette to the ground. DET. MANOLIS (CONT’D) And you can quote me on that. Off Urich's look we... Cur TO: INT. MATT’S APARTMENT - NIGHT

dialogues.speaker: CU BLOOD
dialogues.text: swirling down the drain. Matt splashes his face with cold water before opening the medicine cabinet. Looks like Demerol tonight. He peels his shredded costume back to reveal the bloody ROAD RASH on his chest and stomach... cuT TO The fireplace to reveal Matt's shredded Daredevil costume burning. He watches as the double-D warps and melts in th blaze before walking over to the bas relief on the wall. The relief OPENS UP to reveal a hidden COMBINATION LOCK. spins the dial, knowing the CLICKS by heart, before unloc the door and SLIDING the wall open to reveal... A whole closet full of spare billy clubs and costumes. He hangs up his boots and gloves and slides the door shut...

dialogues.speaker: NEW YORK TIMES NEWSPAPER
dialogues.text: The headline VIGILANTE. Under that: NIKOLAS NATCHTOS DEAD (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As we move past a series of ON-CAMERA REPORTERS jockeying position before the mansion...

dialogues.speaker: REPORTER
dialogues.text: .-a scene of carnage last night with explosions, police officers killed, and gunfire in the streets-- REPORTER #2 ; ...the breaking New York Times story will identify Nikolas Natchios as the so- called ‘Kingpin of Crime.‘ Files found in Natchios’ office seem to implicate Natchios in a myriad of crimes which terrified this city since--

dialogues.speaker: REPORTER
dialogues.text: .--Daredevil, New York's self-styled vigilante, was said to be the prime suspect in the murder. Police believe Daredevil was seeking justice for a litany of crimes committed by Nikolas ‘The Kingpin’ Natchios...

dialogues.speaker: ON MATT
dialogues.text: as he tries to work his way past the police...

dialogues.speaker: POLICEMAN
dialogues.text: Behind the line!

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: I'ma friend of Elektra Natchios.

dialogues.speaker: POLICEMAN
dialogues.text: That's what every reporter here says. You ain't cleared, you ain‘t goin’ in. Matt is turned away as we CLOSE ON a window in the second story of the Natchios mansion. cuT TO:

dialogues.speaker: ON ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: sitting on the floor, watching the reporters on televisio (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Slowly rocking back and forth, her arms wrapped around he knees, nearly catatonic. Her eyes are wild. Feral.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A furious EDITOR holds up the New York Times paper.

dialogues.speaker: EDITOR
dialogues.text: What’s wrong with this headline, Urich? It says New York Times! I let you chase boogie men for six months and when they actually turn out to be real you get scooped by the Times?

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: I was waiting for the facts. There’s no real proof that Natchios was the Kingpin or that Daredevil was the killer. That story is premature.

dialogues.speaker: EDITOR
dialogues.text: ‘Premature?' The Times outsold us today ten-to-one! Premature! Urich storms out as the Editor calls after him: EDITOR (CONT’D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where we see Matt sitting at the table, reading the brail newspaper version of The New York Times. We hear a loud POUNDING on the door.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Matt? You home? He POUNDS some more. Matt finally gets up and opens the d to reveal Foggy, breathless. FOGGY (CONT’D) I heard. It’s all over the news. How is she doing?

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: I can’t get to her. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Jesus. The poor thing... He stops when he notices the cuts on Matt‘s face. FOGGY (CONT’D) What happened to you?

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Ran into a door. Matt turns back inside as Foggy reacts.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: How many times? Matt sits back at the table. Foggy sits across from him.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Guess what I found out? (beat) There is no Mark Welch.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Then you were right. It’s a dead end. Foggy takes out the piece of paper that Matt used in Lisa Tazio’s apartment. MARK WELCH 6301000.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It‘s not a name. It’s a hotel. Someone named Welch was at The Mark. And that phone number wasn’t a phone number... Foggy puts a SLASH on the 630 and TWO DOTS onto the 1000. Changing what looked like a phone number into: 6/30 10:00

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: She didn't press hard enough for us to read it. Lisa Tazio was meeting somebody named Welch at ten o’clock at The Mark. June 30th. The night she was murdered.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: It doesn’t prove anything. Matt gets up and walks into the kitchen. He pours from a specialized coffee maker for the blind (timed braille buttons, burn protection) and pours himself a cup.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: But if you’re right and that’s the last thing she wrote on the day of-- (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: What do I know, Foggy? He turns away and stands before the open window.

dialogues.speaker: MATT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What do I know about anything?

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: You know about justice. All that talk about making a difference? Sticking up for the little guy? Well I‘1l be damed if you don’t got me believing it. Matt shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: I'm sorry. You're on your own today.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: The funeral is this morning. It’s the only way I can get to Elektra..

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: I can’t do this by myself...

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: You're a better lawyer than I am. You just have to believe it for yourself.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Iwill. But not today. Now come on. Put on your lawyer clothes and let’s go. Matt doesn’t move. A LONG BEAT. Foggy scowls.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I‘ll give Cordoza your regards. Foggy walks out as we STAY ON Matt's reaction...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where the PRESS have stopped Fisk on his way to work.

dialogues.speaker: FISK, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: I am overwhelmed with grief at the death of my dear friend Niko Natchios. (MORE)
(CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: FISK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I ask that the press please allow his daughter to bury him in peace, and to not destroy his memory with these ridiculous accusations of organized crime. Fisk leaves the bank of microphones and walks for the elevators with Wesley in tow.

dialogues.speaker: WESLEY
dialogues.text: I don‘t understand, sir... FISK . Better to appear loyal to a friend than open-minded to his slander. Especially if you’‘re the one who slandered him.

dialogues.speaker: WESLEY
dialogues.text: Brilliant, sir.

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: Wesley, if you must patronize me, at least try to be clever about it.

dialogues.speaker: WESLEY
dialogues.text: Yes, sir. CcuT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A massive, sound-proofed room with black marble walls. Fi steps in and takes off his coat. But then he stops when h hears a high-pitched WHIRRING from off-screen.

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: How did you get past security?

dialogues.speaker: ON BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: sitting at his desk, holding a PENCIL in an electric sharpener. He pulls the sharpened pencil out and walks it across his fingers, like a magician with a card trick.

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: You mean that guy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: to reveal Fisk's new Bodyguard laying on the floor, stuck with a half-dozen sharpened pencils. Fisk sighs.

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: Was that necessary? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: No. But it was fun. Fisk pours himself a drink.

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: You've exceeded all of my expectations. Even managed to implicate Daredevil in the process. You should be pleased. Bullseye scowls.

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: He made me miss. Fisk smiles as he holds up an olive for his drink.

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: Too much pride can kill a man. Fisk drops the olive just as Bullseye whips the sharpened pencil through the air--SPEARING it against the wall.

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: Tell your boys to stay out of Hell’s Kitchen. Anybody gets in my way and they end up like pencil boy.

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: Done. Anything else you need? Now that you've seen Daredevil for yourself?

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: Yeah... Bullseye leans forward.

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I want a fuckin' costume.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MUSIC UP: BRACKISH by Kitty Where we see Elektra wearing a black leotard and work-out wraps. She holds a razor sharp sai (three-pronged sword) each hand. She expertly whips the sai around her body, savagely attacking the air around her. Primitive rage. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The walls are covered with newspaper articles. She pulls hidden sai from her leg holster and THROWS it across the room. It sticks into the wall with a THUNK! Right through the picture of Daredevil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where we see Foggy trying to fill in for Matt. He’s sweat profusely through his coat, winging it:

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: ...and what happened from there? Cordoza is up on the witness stand.

dialogues.speaker: CORDOZA
dialogues.text: Man, I was so wasted...it’s kind of hard to remember everything... FOGGY . But you remember where you were until ten fifteen p.m. Remember?

dialogues.speaker: CORDOZA
dialogues.text: Yeah. Sure. Where was I again? The Prosecution smiles while the Judge rolls her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: (checking his notes) Um...where is--here--you said you were in Chumley’s Bar until ten-fifteen. And then you went to meet a friend--

dialogues.speaker: CORDOZA
dialogues.text: That’s right. Turk. I was going to meet Turk. Cause he owed me some money.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: That's right. And you talked to Turk outside of his apartment at 33rd, a block from Lisa Tazio’s apartment. There you passed out from drinking, correct?

dialogues.speaker: CORDOZA
dialogues.text: Right. No wait. I just remembered-- (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Moving on here... The Prosecutor jumps in:

dialogues.speaker: PROSECUTOR
dialogues.text: Objection. Defense didn’t allow Mr. Cordoza to finish answering.

dialogues.speaker: JUDGE
dialogues.text: Sustained. Continue, Mr. Cordoza. Foggy wipes his perspiring forehead.

dialogues.speaker: CORDOZA
dialogues.text: Turk didn't have my money but he did have a couple blunts. We got stoned and then he went inside to get something to eat.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Terrific and then you passed out.

dialogues.speaker: CORDOZA
dialogues.text: Yeah. I woke up with this gun in my hand and cops everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: (turning to the jury) So he was unconscious during the time of the shooting. Thank you, Mr. Cordoza. I have no further questions. The Judge hits her gavel.

dialogues.speaker: JUDGE
dialogues.text: Court’s in recess. Counsel? Foggy steps up to the bench. JUDGE (CONT’D) For your sake, I hope that your partner comes back soon. Foggy nods. Me too,  79.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the rain continues to fall. We see Elektra dressed all black as she will be from now on in our story; as if in perpetual mourning. She watches as the casket is lowered into the ground beside her mother’s tomb. But she doesn’t cry. Her eyes are cold and dead. She turns for the limo.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Elektra...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To reveal Matt standing before her. Stavros starts for hi but Elektra waves him away.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: It’s okay. Matt steps over and holds her in his arms.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: I've been trying to reach you.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: It's better this way...

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: You don’t have to go through this alone.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: Stay away, Matt. Please.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: I can’t do that.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: I feel like I’m going crazy. Like I’m split right down the middle...

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: I understand. Believe me.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: I won’t be a victim again... She kisses him on the cheek and turns away...

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Elektra! But she slips into her limousine and drives away. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As we see Fisk smile and get into a limousine of his own. The limousines drive off, leaving Matt behind. Until...

dialogues.speaker: A CIGARETTE BUTT
dialogues.text: rolls into frame. Matt turns to find Ben Urich before him And finally he loses it:

dialogues.speaker: MATT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What do you want?

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: (startled) Matt, it’s Ben Urich--

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: I know who it is! Why are you following me all the time? If you know something just say it! Get it over with! A BEAT.

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: I think Cordoza's innocent. Matt stops as realizes he was way off.

dialogues.speaker: URICH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I've been working on a story about the Kingpin. Pulitzer Prize stuff. Or at least it was until the New York Times published theirs first.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: You lost me...

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: I had a Deep Throat source. (beat) Named Lisa Tazio.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Tazio had access to the Kingpin?

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: One of the Kingpin’s men, I think. Pillow talk in a hotel room. She sold the information to me piecemeal. I never got a name. But her getting killed at random doesn't sit well with me. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Will you testify to that?

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: (shakes his head) Fifth Amendment and all that. Story’s still open as far as I‘m concerned.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Is their anything you can tell me now that will help my client? Urich lights a cigarette.

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: ‘Good luck.‘ That‘s all I got about now. I'll keep in touch. As Urich heads off we... cut TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very upscale hotel on the Upper East Side. Foggy steps inside and strolls over to a perky RECEPTIONIST.

dialogues.speaker: RECEPTIONIST
dialogues.text: Welcome to the Mark, my name is Grace. How may I help you today?

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Hi Grace. My boss stayed here a while back on June 30th. Mr. Welch? And he thinks he was mischarged for the room.

dialogues.speaker: RECEPTIONIST
dialogues.text: Oh dear. Let's check that out... (looking up the computer) His name again?

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Welch.

dialogues.speaker: RECEPTIONIST
dialogues.text: First name? Foggy hesitates.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Mister. She looks up at him. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: FOGGY (CONT’D) I just started working for him. The Receptionist nods, unsure, before going back to the computer screen:

dialogues.speaker: RECEPTIONIST
dialogues.text: Yes. Here we are.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: If you could print me out his bill...

dialogues.speaker: RECEPTIONIST
dialogues.text: Oh, I’m sorry, sir. We can‘t give out personal information on hotel guests.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Mister Welch will be terribly upset.

dialogues.speaker: RECEPTIONIST
dialogues.text: Hotel policy, I'm afraid. I'd need to get his authorization first.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Go ahead. Call him. The Receptionist looks to Foggy.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I'll wait. She dials up the phone number as Foggy smiles. Then:

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: Yes?

dialogues.speaker: RECEPTIONIST
dialogues.text: Wesley Welch; please. Foggy smiles. He’s got the full name now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where we see Wesley on his cell phone.

dialogues.speaker: WESLEY
dialogues.text: Speaking. Who is this? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: RECEPTIONIST
dialogues.text: I‘m sorry to bother you, sir. I have someone here who’s requesting a copy of your last hotel bill. Wesley freezes.

dialogues.speaker: WESLEY
dialogues.text: What? Foggy motions to the Receptionist.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Let me talk to him. She hands Foggy the phone. FOGGY (CONT’D) (into the phone) Mr. Welch?

dialogues.speaker: WELCH
dialogues.text: Yes?

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Lisa Tazio says “hello.” Wesley freezes. Foggy smiles.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You're going down, asshole. Foggy hands the phone back to the Receptionist. Smiles. FOGGY (CONT’D) Have a nice day. He walks out as we STAY ON her reaction. INT. MATT’S APARTMENT - NIGHT Matt pops some pills from the kitchen cabinet. And then h stops. Smells. That scent...

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: The door was open. He turns around as we reveal... ELEKTRA. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Tears streaming down her face.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: I don't want to be alone anymore.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: You don’t have to be. Ever. She falls into his arms, crying.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: I'm sorry... He kisses her head.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: (echoing her own words) You’re here now. That‘’s all that matters. He kisses her through her tears as we slowly

dialogues.speaker: LATER.
dialogues.text: As Matt and Elektra make love. Elektra’s hands trace the battle scars on Matt’s back. Matt's fingers trace old sca on Elektra‘'s wrists. Two people with road maps of pain. lose them in a twisted mesh of sheets as we... FADE OUT.

dialogues.speaker: TO BLACKNESS.
dialogues.text: And then we hear the hellish sounds of SCREAMS and GUNFIR We PULL BACK to reveal we’re in an EXTREME CLOSE-UP of a LITTLE GIRL'S EYE. She stares back at us in a catatonic trance as RED BLOOD splatters across her white dress--

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: waking up in Matt's bed. Her eyes wild, her chest heaving She looks over to Matt as she begins to remember where sh is. And then she kisses his cheek and slips out of hed...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EXT. HELL’S KITCHEN - NIGHT Where we see FIVE STREET PUNKS hanging out in an alleyway getting high. One of them turns as he notices:

dialogues.speaker: STREET PUNK
dialogues.text: Check this out.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: walks towards them down the alley. But it’s a different Elektra than we've seen before. She’s a warrior now. Black leather body suit. Sais strapped on each leg. Leath wraps lace up her arms, dangling in the breeze. Her hair her eyes are black and wild as midnight.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: I’m looking for Daredevil. The punks look to each other and start laughing.

dialogues.speaker: STREET PUNK
dialogues.text: Hear that? She's lookin’ for Daredevil.

dialogues.speaker: STREET PUNK
dialogues.text: What’s wrong with us, bitch? She turns to go when he steps in her way.

dialogues.speaker: STREET PUNK
dialogues.text: Where you think you're going?

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: Get out of my way. They laugh again.

dialogues.speaker: STREET PUNK
dialogues.text: Sure. I’11 get out of your way. Right after I’m done with you... He pulls a LARGE KNIFE from his side and waves it before eyes as the others close in, smiling. Hungry wolves.

dialogues.speaker: STREET PUNK
dialogues.text: Do you like it rough, baby? Another Punk slides a CHAIN from his belt loop... (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: STREET PUNK
dialogues.text: Cuz we like it real rough... The CAMERA SLOWLY CIRCLES Elektra until we can see her expression. She’s smiling. God help them. She’s smiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As we see Matt’s eyes flutter open. He reaches over for Elektra and stops when he feels she's gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Punk #1 reaches for Elektra. All it takes is a milli- second and--CRAAACK!--he won’t be using that arm again fo long, long time.

dialogues.speaker: PUNK
dialogues.text: LUNGES for Elektra with his hunting knife. But Elektra expertly SIDE-STEPS his parry and PALM STRIKES his nose, driving his sinus cavity up into his brain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As she whips out her SAIS and spins them in her hands bef stabbing him like a matador with a bull!

dialogues.speaker: PUNK
dialogues.text: attacks Elektra from behind. But she drops and SWEEP-KICK his LEGS out, immediately laying waste to his windpipe wi two-fingered Ninjitsu hand strike.

dialogues.speaker: PUNK
dialogues.text: The biggest of the gang swings at Elektra with his FIST WRAPPED IN CHAINS. Elektra SNATCHES his hand and TWISTS t chain around it, turning his wrist to pulp. He SCREAMS as she DROPS HIM with a doubled-up kick to the groin and chi

dialogues.speaker: ON ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: as she pulls the sais out of the dead Punk’s body and spi them again before returning them to her leg holsters. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: I like it rough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where we see Foggy working late into the night. Notes and briefs are everywhere. He’s doing it. He’s in the zone. Even Karen looks impressed as she steps in to check on hi You need more coffee... She takes his cup for a refill as Foggy smiles his thanks CcuT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Urich slaps a HUNDRED DOLLAR BILL into the palm of a youn hip-looking FORENSICS ASSISTANT.

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: This better be good, Adam...

dialogues.speaker: FORENSICS ASSISTANT
dialogues.text: I’m always good. You know that. They step into a PRIVATE ROOM where the Forensics Assista takes out the plastic bag holding Daredevil’s BILLY CLUB.

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: I’ve seen it.

dialogues.speaker: FORENSICS ASSISTANT
dialogues.text: You haven't seen this. The Forensics Assistant presses a HIDDEN STUD on the insi handle as--SNIKT!--the end of the club CURLS into a handl

dialogues.speaker: FORENSICS ASSISTANT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You said to look out for weird shit. This is pretty weird, man. We CLOSE ON Urich’s stunned reaction as he recognizes the deep red cane of Matt Murdock.

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: You have no idea... Suddenly, Urich’s phone RINGS, causing both men to jump. Urich smiles ruefully before answering the call: (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: URICH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Urich. We INTER-CUT with Foggy back at the office.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Ben, it's Foggy Nelson.

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: This...this isn’t a good time--

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: It's about Lisa Tazio. Urich stops.

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: Go on.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Does the name ‘Wesley Welch’ mean anything to you? Urich stops. And then he begins to smile.

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: Oh yeah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daredevil SWINGS UP to the rooftops, searching for Elektr when we hear a SCREAM coming from the darkness: WOMAN‘S VOICE

dialogues.speaker: HELP
dialogues.text: Daredevil grimaces.

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: Not now... But the woman SCREAMS again:

dialogues.speaker: PLEASE HELP ME
dialogues.text: Daredevil CURSES under his breath and turns towards the s of the woman in distress. cut TO:  89.

dialogues.speaker: A BROWNSTONE
dialogues.text: As Daredevil lands on the roof, listening. Laundry has be strung up across the rooftop, creating a maze of imagery. We hear a RUSTLING coming from the darkness. And as Daredevil steps closer to investigate we go to... DAREDEVIL’S POV Of what looks to be a WOMAN IN A DRESS. He steps closer a closer until--FLAP FLAP FLAP FLAP!

dialogues.speaker: PIGEONS
dialogues.text: FLY INTO CAMERA, beating their wings in our face!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To reveal the dress is empty, hung by clothespins in the shape of a woman. Daredevil tries to get his bearings as-

dialogues.speaker: WHAM
dialogues.text: He’s KICKED in the back of the head by a BLACK LEATHER BO Daredevil hits the ground hard before looking up to see..

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: standing over him, seething! The cry for help was a trap.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: Remember me, murderer? She TRIPLE-KICKS to the BALLS, STOMACH, and FACE! Daredev struggles back to his feet as Elektra circles around him. ELEKTRA (cont ‘d) It’s your turn to bleed. She delivers a series of RAPID FIRE KICKS AND STRIKES tha drive Daredevil back across the rooftop. But then she thr a kick to his head which Daredevil catches in an ANKLE~LO

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: I didn’t kill your father.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: Liar! She JUMPS UP with the other foot and KICKS Daredevil acro the face! He stumbles back as she whips out her sai and expertly TWIRLS it in her hands. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: It was the man with the Bullseye. She STABS at Daredevil. He narrowly misses her parry as t razor-sharp blade SLICES through the fabric of his costum Elektra whips the other sai up into his face but Daredevi deflects the blade and GRABS HER in an ELBOW LOCK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wraps his other arm around her throat, pulling her aga his chest. He whispers pleadingly:

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I'm not going to fight you. And in this moment we realize--that they're in the same e position they were in that day in the park. When Elektra said she'd never fall for the same attack twice.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: Good. Then this will be quick. She suddenly WHIPS her sai out and THRUSTS it into his ch He CRIES OUT as he drops to his knees, blood pouring out Elektra pounces on him with her sai against his throat!

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Now I want to look into the eyes of my father’s killer as he dies. She PULLS BACK HIS HOOD. And then she freezes as she sees

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Now you know... She shakes her head in disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: No...

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: It’s not too late, Elektra.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: I’ve done bad things...

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: We‘ve all done bad things.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: You don‘t understand. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: And then from the darkness:

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Oh, Daaaaaredevil...? We hear FOOTSTEPS CLANGING up the metal fire escape from other side of the building as Elektra’s eyes narrow.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: He's going to pay for what he did.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: (getting weaker) Don’t...don’t go... Elektra bends down and kisses Matt on the lips. It’s a hungry kiss of passion and pain and remorse...

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, my love. Daredevil passes out from the blood loss. Elektra gently pulls his hood back down over his face.

dialogues.speaker: ON BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: As he steps off of the fire escape and onto the roof. He smiles as Elektra unsheathes her sai. ELEKTRA (CONT’D) Murderer...

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: Yeah. But you gotta admit that was one helluva toss. Elektra LEAPS for Bullseye, KICKING him across the face w SLASHING at him with her sais!

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: dodges the sword strikes as the blades send SPARKS FLYING across the brick wall of the rooftop! But then he flinche millisecond too late and--WHOOSH!--a blade catches his ch Bullseye touches the cut and tastes his own blood. BULLSEYE (cont‘d)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To reveal he’s SNAPPED a T.V. ANTENNA off. Elektra CHARGE as he whips the antenna out across her face-- (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: AAhh! --while taking her feet out from beneath her! But Elektra springs up in a HANDSTAND and JUMP-KICKS him in the face!

dialogues.speaker: ON ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: delivering KICKS and STRIKES so fast that Bullseye can ba defend himself! He’s driven back against the ledge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see a crowd gathering on the street below to watch as hear the sound of POLICE SIRENS approaching.

dialogues.speaker: ON ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: as she twirls her sai in her hand.

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: Last words before you die? Bullseye grins as he reaches into his belt for...

dialogues.speaker: A PLAYING CARD. ,
dialogues.text: The Ace of Spades.

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: Pick a card. Any card. Elektra reacts as he suddenly THROWS THE CARD with incred precision--SLICING Elektra’s throat!

dialogues.speaker: ON ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: Dropping her sai as she falls to her knees--holding her h against her neck to stop the bleeding. BULLSEYE (cont’d) You're good, baby. I'11 give you that. She reaches for her sai but Bullseye KICKS IT UP into his hand and smiles. BULLSEYE (cont’d) But I’m magic. Elektra tears the sash from her arm and ties it around he neck like a tourniquet, still game to fight. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: ON DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: as his eyes flutter open in time to see...

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And for my next trick...

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: Swinging the sai UP INTO ELERTRA'S STOMACH!

dialogues.speaker: ON ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: as the blade POKES OUT of her back in silhouette! Bullsey slides the blade out as she crumples to her knees.

dialogues.speaker: A POLICE HELICOPTER
dialogues.text: Flies overhead, ILLUMINATING THEM in the passing flash of spotlight. Bullseye SCOWLS and slips into the darkness of the rooftops and chimneys, leaving them to die together.

dialogues.speaker: ON ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: As she stumbles towards Daredevil...leaving a trail of bl behind her...until she falls into his arms... DAREDEVIL (cont ‘d) No... . Her eyes flutter as she slowly reaches up and touches his cheek. Blood flowing from her mouth. He touches her face. Just like he did that day in the rain. A million years ag

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Please...

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: Shhh...

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: Oh God...

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA
dialogues.text: Thank you, Matt... A little smile as the light leaves her eyes...

dialogues.speaker: ELEKTRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ..-for helping me see. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: And with that she collapses in his arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As we see the POLICE coming up the steps. Daredevil can’t stay any longer. He kisses her one last time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the door on the roof BURSTS OPEN to reveal Detective Manolis and his men, armed with guns at the ready.

dialogues.speaker: HOLD IT
dialogues.text: But Daredevil is already gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SEARCHLIGHT from a POLICE HELICOPTER passes over the church, revealing a FIGURE draped over the crufix... DAREDEVIL. We're back to the beginning of our story.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As we see Bullseye crouched down, smiling at what he’s fo A BLOOD TRAIL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Father Everett pulls off Daredevil’s cowl. He reacts t the dead eyes of the man before him.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER EVERETT
dialogues.text: You. You’re the vigilante...

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: (grimacing) I’m not much of anything... The Priest takes the purple cloth from his neck and uses to stop the bleeding. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: FATHER EVERETT
dialogues.text: God has infinite mercy, my son. All you have to do is ask...

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Everything's been taken from me, and now I’m supposed to ask for mercy? (beat) I don't ask for mercy. People ask me.

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Good line. Can I use it? as Bullseye steps through the front door. BULLSEYE (CONT‘D) You leave one helluva blood trail. A blind man could follow it.

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: (to the Priest) Is there a back way out?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER EVERETT
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: Take it. Now.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER EVERETT
dialogues.text: What about you?

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: I have to finish this.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER EVERETT
dialogues.text: You can‘t fight like this.

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: Have faith. Isn’t that right, Father? Father Everett says a silent prayer before he turns and hurries out. Until it’s just Daredevil and Bullseye.

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: Bring it on. And in that split second Daredevil WHIPS his billy club o across the church-~SMASHING Bullseye‘s mouth! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: te eat  96.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: BULLSEYE (cont‘d) Motherf--

dialogues.speaker: ON BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: as he spits a mouthful of teeth into his hand! And then h WHIPS his teeth back at Daredevil STRIKING HIM in his eye

dialogues.speaker: ON BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: as he kicks the billy club up into his hand and CRACKS th grappling hook into Daredevil’s chest wound. Daredevil grimaces as he drops to his knees from the pain... BULLSEYE (cont’d) This is my favorite part. Where I get to choose how you die. We hear the BELLS up in the tower as they automatically b to ring on the hour. Bullseye gets an idea and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As police cars pull up outside. Manolis steps out. He loo up to the BELL TOWER in the moonlight as we...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Daredevil drops to his knees in pain; the CLANGING SOU is like knives driving into his hyper-sensitive ears.

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: What’s with you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as even the shadow world he sees is disappearing. Until a that’s left is infinite blackness.

dialogues.speaker: MANOLIS
dialogues.text: Shouting over to his men as they take position:

dialogues.speaker: MANOLIS
dialogues.text: I don’t care if it’s a church! Break the Goddamned door down if you have to! (MORE) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: MANOLIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to his other men) Keep him in your sites!

dialogues.speaker: SHARPSHOOTER
dialogues.text: Which one?

dialogues.speaker: MANOLIS
dialogues.text: Both of them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Ben Urich’s car pulls up. He jumps out and freezes at what he sees.

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: Matt...

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: Laughing as he holds a SAI up, glistening in the moonligh

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: It’s hers. Seems fitting, doesn’t it? But then the BELLS RING for the last time as we go to... DAREDEVIL’S POV Coming back from his shattered senses... CU DAREDEVIL’S HAND as he clenches his fist and...

dialogues.speaker: WHAM
dialogues.text: PUNCHES his way out of the darkness! We hear the CRACK of Bullseye’s jaw--like the sound of a bottle breaking--as i hangs open unhinged!

dialogues.speaker: ON DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: as he WHIRLS around and GRABS Bullseye, shoving him out t window of the tower. Holding him out by the neck. Bullsey spits out words through broken teeth:

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: You can't do it, can you Devil? That's what separates me and you. You’re soft. You'll try to have me arrested. Maybe I‘1l even go to jail again. For a little while. But Fisk will get me out. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Daredevil goes cold as he realizes:

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: Fisk is the Kingpin... Bullseye laughs and nods.

dialogues.speaker: BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: Owns the whole Goddamn town. I’11 get his lawyers. And his judges. And I’ll walk out the door. (spitting blood) And I‘1]1 kill again. And again. And that blood will be on your hands then. A LONG BEAT.

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: You'll kill no one...

dialogues.speaker: ON BULLSEYE
dialogues.text: as he begins to realize...

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ever again. We watch his horrified face as he DROPS all the way down the street below with a sickening THUD!

dialogues.speaker: THE POLICE
dialogues.text: approach the body with their guns drawn, taking no chance But Bullseye isn't getting up. cut TO:

dialogues.speaker: THE POLICE
dialogues.text: Running up the steps to the bell tower to find--he’s gone cut TO:

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: As he steps over to Manolis.

dialogues.speaker: DET. MANOLIS
dialogues.text: What do you want?

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: I've got a gift for you.

dialogues.speaker: DET. MANOLIS
dialogues.text: The hell are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: The collar of a lifetime. Manolis looks him over, suspicious.

dialogues.speaker: DET. MANOLIS
dialogues.text: Why me?

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: It kills me to admit this, Nick, but you're the only honest cop I know... Off his reaction we

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As we see the glorious Fisk building all lit up. It’s emp except for one LARGE SILHOUETTE on the top floor. And the

dialogues.speaker: WOOSH
dialogues.text: The power is turned off one floor at a time. Until the entire building is shrouded in darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As we see Wilson Fisk standing in the darkness. The light of the city behind him. We hear the GROAN of heavy metal doors opening as he turns to see the shadow of a devil. The two stare each other down for a LONG BEAT.

dialogues.speaker: FISK'S CANE
dialogues.text: tightens in his grip...

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL'S BILLY CLUB
dialogues.text: slides out of his holster...

dialogues.speaker: . DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: Kingpin. Fisk smiles. Nods. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: Yes. As Daredevil looms...

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: Time to give the devil his due. Daredevil SHOOTS his billy club across the room! But Fisk fast for such a big man and he WRAPS the club around his cane, YANKING Daredevil off of his feet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they COLLIDE like two mighty bulls! Brute, massive strength against speed and agility! The STORM RAGES outside as the fight intensifies! Fisk pi up a barbell and THROWS IT at Daredevil! It CRASHES INTO wall as DD barely ducks underneath!

dialogues.speaker: ON DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: as he jumps onto Fisk, CHOKING HIM OUT. But Fisk is too strong. He FLIPS Daredevil over his head and brutally SMASHES him onto the ground. Broken and bloodied. DAREDEVIL’S POV His senses a mess. As helpless as any other blind man.

dialogues.speaker: ON FISK
dialogues.text: He pulls a red rose off of a vase on the table. He smells through his bloody nose and grins. :

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: Time to say good-bye. Fisk DROPS THE ROSE onto Daredevil’s body. FISK (CONT’D) I always thought the rose was a nice touch...

dialogues.speaker: ON DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: He closes his fist around the rose as he realizes.

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: Fallon... (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: You’ve done your homework. Fallon was an early employer of mine. Some didn’t like to give the death blow. But I could kill aman just as soon as look at him. We hear the THUNDER outside and the sound of the RAIN INCREASING. Daredevil turns towards the sound of the storm...and we remember what he once said about the rain.

dialogues.speaker: FISK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: See you in hell. The Kingpin raises his heavy cane over his head as Darede summons his last ounce of strength and THROWS HIS BILLY C up to the ceiling. He misses Fisk but strikes... A SPRINKLER HEAD. The sprinkler SPRAYS WATER down into the office as Fisk l up, confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the beads of water bounce down off of Fisk's massive b showing him now in perfect silhouette. Just like Elektra the rain that day in the park.

dialogues.speaker: ON FISK
dialogues.text: As he swings down with his cane--but Daredevil rolls out the way just in time! Fisk GROWLS and swings again. But now Daredevil can hear the SPLASHING of his footsteps The SWOOSH of his heavy fists through the rain. Fisk struggles to regain his balance as Daredevil slides through his legs and SCISSOR-KICKS his legs!

dialogues.speaker: CRACK
dialogues.text: The mighty Kingpin falls, crippled at the knees!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As both men lie battered on the floor. A BEAT. And then Daredevil struggles to his feet. He eyes Fisk’s heavy can

dialogues.speaker: FISK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Go on. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Daredevil picks up the cane. FISK (CONT‘D) Do it. Daredevil raises the solid crystal setting high in the ai The death blow. Fisk smiles through cracked, bloody lips. | FISK (CONT’D) You see? We're the same, you and I. Daredevil stops. A LONG BEAT as Fisk’s words hang in the air. He drops the cane to the floor as Fisk’s smile fades

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: No. We hear the SHOUTS OF THE POLICE, running up the steps. B before they get there the door swings open revealing-- BEN URICH. He looks to Daredevil...

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: You'd better go. I'11 watch him ‘til the cops arrive.

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: Why should I trust you?

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: Because I know the truth... Daredevil stops.

dialogues.speaker: URICH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Justice is blind. Off Daredevil’s reaction we

dialogues.speaker: THE POLICE
dialogues.text: BARGING into the office to see...

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: on his knees in a pool of bloody water. Urich leans again the desk calmly smoking a cigarette as Manolis steps in. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: Nothing to see here, Nick. Manolis smirks. Fisk glowers from the floor.

dialogues.speaker: FISK
dialogues.text: You've got nothing on me!

dialogues.speaker: URICH
dialogues.text: Funny thing about nothing. It usually turns out to be something. And then Manolis calls to his men:

dialogues.speaker: BRING HIM IN
dialogues.text: Fisk stares in disbelief as we see...

dialogues.speaker: WESLEY
dialogues.text: Being led into the room in handcuffs. He points his locke hands at his bloodied boss.

dialogues.speaker: WESLEY
dialogues.text: That's him. The Kingpin. Urich smiles. Even Manolis cracks a grin.

dialogues.speaker: MANOLIS
dialogues.text: Somebody see if they can fit a pair of cuffs on this tub of shit.

dialogues.speaker: ON DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: As he opens the palm of his hand to reveal... THE ROSE. He lets it drop. And with it, the pain of the past.

dialogues.speaker: DAREDEVIL
dialogues.text: This one’s for you, Dad. The rose strikes the sidewalk in SLOW-MOTION as we FADE OUT.  104.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The headline screams in the typical Post style: THE REAL KINGPIN? And below that: DAREDEVIL STRIKES BACK! -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where we see Matt and Foggy having a cup of coffee.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: (reading) *...police say that although there was no eyewitnesses, they suspect Daredevil was the one to bring Fisk to justice.’

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: See? No eyewitnesses.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Don’t tell me you’re still a skeptic?

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Even Bigfoot has eyewitnesses.

dialogues.speaker: FOGGY
dialogues.text: Aw come on... Matt laughs. And then:

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Hey... Foggy glances up.

dialogues.speaker: MATT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You did it. You got Cordoza off. FOGGY “ Yeah. I just wish I knew what happened. Urich won't tell me anything and neither will the police. I just hope this Welch guy gets what's coming to him. Matt smiles.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: He will...
